website_summaries.verdict: This single-player detective game is affordable and fun to play, but the load times will try your patience.
pros: Explore a vast cityscape as the undercover detective Chase McCain
More than 100 vehicles to collect and use
A humorous and entertaining game filled with puzzles and chases
cons: Has a long load time for all aspects of the game, including loading missions and entering new areas

customer_reviews.title: Interesting and fun entry in the Lego game line
customer_reviews.text: This is fun and easily now the boy's "go to" Wii U game. I haven't played for more than a few minutes, but I have watched the game and find it more interesting than other Lego games. I have played Jurassic World with the boy and this has more depth. I particularly like the corny script and fun character interactions. Not embarrassed to say I have laughed out loud at some of the dialogue and puns.
customer_reviews.author: PSUEng

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: I haven't ever played a lego game before but my sister likes them so I got this one and loved it. It was funny, I liked running over everything with my car and unlocking all the characters and vehicles. You can literally "steal" any vehicle including cars, mopeds, skateboards and segways. I didn't like that you could buy extras with the studs you earned through playing but had to turn them on each time you started the game, I didn't realize that at first and so wasn't getting some of the bonuses I thought I was. Also, the game took forever to load up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Exploring, new features to unlock
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo son enjoys this game on our Wii U, has exploring, problem solving, driving, boats, all kinds of interesting things. Unlocks new things as challenges are solved (he just unlocked boats in the harbor and it's like a whole new game now). He likes to commandeer people's vehicles a little too much tho...it says "Sorry it's a police emergency" as he jumps into some dude's ride and takes off. Lol at least they're polite.
customer_reviews.author: Angelic M Hudelson

customer_reviews.title: we really like the lego games as they require thought and problem ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 8 year old son. we really like the lego games as they require thought and problem solving but give clues as to what you must do. only just arrived yesterday so he has only played the very beginning of the game but he loves it. i was sucked into it as well. the jokes are actually really funny too edit: 1.9% into the game and it froze - saying there was something wrong with the disc. (we had not touched it, it was working fine and then all of a sudden for no reason would not go any further). very upsetting, now the game is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game...
customer_reviews.text: But had to knock of a star because the load time. This reminds me of load times on the first cd systems, takes at least a minute to load anything and even the new versions have the same issue. No clue what the problem is with it. If you played other Lego games on the past, this will be a little different. It still has its good humor and costume changes, but now it's open world. Again, the only thing that reality turned me away was the load times.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, Many loading screens
customer_reviews.text: I know this came out close to the WiiU launch, but it is still one of the best games on the system and one of the few that really uses the game pad affectively. If you have played any Lego games then you pretty much know what to expect from this one. I would have given it 5 stars, but I had to take away one for all the loading screens! Once you are in the over world you are free to run and drive endlessly, but going into a mission, building, or starting the game you have to wait for what seems like forever for the game to load.
customer_reviews.author: J. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great game for all ages!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun game!! My son and I spent a lot of time sitting here playing this game. The hint upgrade that is available to buy makes finding the red brinks and clues so much easier! We had so much fun running around the town, finding things, and building things. I highly recommend this game. My son is 10 with special needs, and he was able to play this game with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Best Lego game ever!
customer_reviews.text: What a great game! Play this for about 30 minutes a night with my almost five year old. He loves it and only needs my help on a few of the more difficult missions. This game is huge! So much to do. The city is enormous and allows exploration if you don't feel like working on the current mission. We will probably finish it up by Christmas. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RatherBeScubaDiving

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for my son's to play they were disappointed it was only 1 player every other Lego game ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's to play they were disappointed it was only 1 player every other Lego game is 2 but we just set a timer so they could take turns but it's still alot of fun sometimes I play it too i would recommend this to any lego fan
customer_reviews.author: christine88

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This wii game was such a good purchase to make. Some games in the past have been a letdown, or too complicated for our 8 year old. This one is pretty easy for her to navigate, and yet challenging enough to remain interesting. Me and my husband love watching her play it because it is so engaging with storylines and the humor you see in The Lego movie.
customer_reviews.author: corp7

customer_reviews.title: Great game!  My 4 year old loves it but can't do all of the missions completely and needs help... great 4 problem solving skills
customer_reviews.text: The one we received had something wrong with it so we had to send it back... but we bought it locally and even I'm hooked on this game... I love that its problem solving and not just mindless video gaming. At times my 4 year old gets a little frustrated and asks me to complete a mission for him or wants me to play for a little bit so he can just watch... I don't mind because it's fun!
customer_reviews.author: pepperTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Hours of clean fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My son is playing this right now and plays it often. A really great game for kids that is clean and I can trust. It's hard to know what your kids are playing these days but this is great for adventure for the kids and I don't have to worry about the content. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Odom

customer_reviews.title: Lego is great!
customer_reviews.text: Well written game for all ages, everyone in the house enjoyed playing/watching this game on Christmas. There are scenes from The Shawshank Redemption and The Matrix that all adults can enjoy even if the kids don't get it. Lego creates the best clear family oriented games.
customer_reviews.author: Celina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not 2 player
customer_reviews.text: Great game. My kids love it. I hate that it’s only one player though. Seems like it wouldn’t have been hard to integrate another player since all the other LEGO games have it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Dove

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo son saw a trailer of this and I thought it looked hokey. He loves it. He's played it for 2-3 weeks and he still hasn't achieved every mission, and it has some pretty funny humor even for adults.
customer_reviews.author: ShaunM

customer_reviews.title: Take a chance
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great little game. My 7 yr old loves it! Like a Lego version of grand theft auto.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shotts

customer_reviews.title: Works great & arrived on time...
customer_reviews.text: The case was cracked on the bottom, so having to tape it quite a bit was kind of a bummer (being that it was a Christmas present). This was a gift for my 9 year old son, he really likes the LEGO series... this worked well, & was shipped on time.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Action packed Lego game that will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this game! I like watching them play it cause it's very entertaining as well.
customer_reviews.author: 4jone

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game! Great price and nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Christy L. Tormoehlen

customer_reviews.title: Game doesnt work, no return option. Heartbroken son.
customer_reviews.text: My son received this game for his birthday and will not play. No option of returning, probably since he just got to try it and was ordered a month ago. He is very upset and let down that the game he has wanted for so long will not work and cannot be exchanged.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica May

customer_reviews.title: SO happy Nintendo has made these Nintendo select games available at ...
customer_reviews.text: SO happy Nintendo has made these Nintendo select games available at $19. This is an excellent game my 6 year old enjoys it the game play is entertaining and fun. Lego need to make more of these game rather than just movie based titles.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: seriously amazing game and very entertaining story even for adults
customer_reviews.text: seriously amazing game and very entertaining story even for adults, a lot of great humor and movie references that will make you laugh and smile and is perfectly appropriate for kids of any age.
customer_reviews.author: alex leisch

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Kids AND Adults!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful game that is fun for kids and adults! There is so much to see in do in Lego City, it will take you hundreds of hours to track everything down. Traveller's Tales has truly outdone themselves on this game! You really get your money's worth, especially now that this is a Nintendo Select title!
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Bought this game for my 4 year old grandson and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game for my 4 year old grandson and he is having a blast playing it! ... the adventures across the city and the many characters keep him entertained for hours! An enjoyable play for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: ron lee

customer_reviews.title: Super Bricks / Builds
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite Lego games ... Mainly cause of super builds / super bricks . Looks good and has some wii u game pad functions , That I really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: GUSS

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old loves this game! I love that he doesnt have to stick to the story and can just drive around.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa N.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun and addicting. The only thing I would improve is in game music in between missions. Fun "GTA Like" sandbox game that I haven't seen alternatively done since Simpson Hit and Run.
customer_reviews.author: JagotiENT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: hands down my kid's favorite game. hours and hours of game play.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: my 8 year old love this game
customer_reviews.text: my 8 year old love this game!!!! Good buy and good clean fun - can built stuff, can drive cars.... great game!!!
customer_reviews.author: V. Leto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived late but great game and in good condition. Kids say it is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good usage of the gamepad, cause that, not support off TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Wish this was multi-player but my kids still enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They have not gotten bored with it and have gotten countless hours of fun ...
customer_reviews.text: My family has so enjoined this game! They have not gotten bored with it and have gotten countless hours of fun and laughs from it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you love Lego video games add this to your collection. So fun
customer_reviews.author: H and E

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: My son is twelve and absolutely loves it. The graphics are very good, plus there are so many levels that it keeps going for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Larry P.

customer_reviews.title: Great game for families!
customer_reviews.text: A great game for young and old alike. My 5 year old son, my wife, and I have a blast playing this together.
customer_reviews.author: DexterJ

customer_reviews.title: Everything is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. It is funny and super fun.
customer_reviews.author: Bookgamer

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this game. One of the best Wii U games on the market. Especially for this price
customer_reviews.author: Kathrynde

customer_reviews.title: 4.3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally available again, and at a good price, The loading times test your patience though,
customer_reviews.author: V K

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Would add 0 star!! Game does not work!! Had to return!
customer_reviews.author: Ren123

customer_reviews.title: Best Lego game since Lego Island
customer_reviews.text: I have been chasing that feeling of playing Lego Island since I was a kid. Other Lego games have come close to filling the void, but they're just not the same... until Lego City. I finally get to live out my dream of running around on a Lego island again. But really this is a great game with a ton of unlockable vehicles and characters. There are some quirks here and there (load times are pretty bad) but for the most part the gameplay is smooth and fun. Definitely the most enjoyable Wii U game I've played so far.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think my husband liked this game better than my ten year old.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great game at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My seven-year-old son really loves this game. He also love LEGO toys!
customer_reviews.author: Zhaopeng Li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for first edition of this game where my kid damaged disc. No problems with game or delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect game for my 6 year old. It's hard enough to keep him interested but not too hard where he gets frustrated. It has a good story and he enjoys the missions. I have fun playing it with him too.
customer_reviews.author: JillBird

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: My sons (8 & 5) love this game. It's interactive and so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Devin D. Waddle

customer_reviews.title: I never liked playing any Lego games but this one is really ...
customer_reviews.text: I never liked playing any Lego games but this one is really fun with really fun way to use WiiU Gamepad.
customer_reviews.author: Sheen Ti.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this game. Had such a great time playing it. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. My 9 year old played for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed one player
customer_reviews.text: Why is this one person game? WE love to play together :-( Bought anyway but not a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: MKchs

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to play, but had long scratch across the disc and was rendered unplayable. Very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working after 3 1/2 weeks. After a long call with Nintendo it would cost $40 to repair the game. Not one scratch on the game yet it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 Player Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Only a 1 player game and the information doesn't state that. Why would Lego and WIIU do a 1 player game?
customer_reviews.author: ANGELCRITIC

customer_reviews.title: BIG DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: I received an empty package, expect i replacement or a refund
customer_reviews.author: Rene Hecker

customer_reviews.title: great game had to have it
customer_reviews.text: great game had to have it. your kid want grand theft auto but its a little too mature for him. Just get him this. Its basically the same this just lego and funny.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute game, wish it was multiplayer
customer_reviews.text: Cute game - we haven't played much as the kids are into different games right now (7, 6, and 4). Since this is a single player game, the kids seem to gravitate toward other games that they can all play together. You can't go wrong with Lego and I'm sure they will catch interest soon!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Marie

product_meta.title: Nintendo Selects: Lego City: Undercover - Wii U
product_meta.description: Nintendo Selects highlights a variety of great games at a great price, including this one.
feature_bullets: Experience LEGO City like never before. Players will encounter familiar play sets come to life as they explore the vast city looking for clues to bring Rex Fury to justice.
Players can go undercover with a variety of disguises including a firefighter a construction worker and even a robber and use their unique abilities to solve puzzles and access new areas of the city.
Players use the Wii U GamePad controller to scan for hidden clues and criminals, receive mission updates and place waypoints on an overhead city map that displays their position in real time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars228 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
